desc: Rhythm Brewing Company is a New Haven CT based Brewing Co. that produces, “RHYTHM”, its Flagship Unfiltered Lager.

layout.text:
WE KEEP THE GOODNESS IN!
"Rhythm Unfiltered Lager", our flagship beer is a modern American style lager, with an ABV of 5.5%. It is smooth, crisp & palette pleasing. 
Our newest brew, “Rhythm Blue Unfiltered Light Lager”. Is an American style “Light” Lager, brewed for a smooth, crisp, clean finish. Light in calories, but not light in flavor.
